name: Captain Redfin and the Many Missing Sprockets
name_original: Captain Redfin and the Many Missing Sprockets
description:
A Fishy Game

Captain Redfin and their crew have found themselves in quite a pickle: they've crashed their ship, and have to find some sprockets in order to get it working again.

You control this school of mighty fish, and can dash around in order to secure yourself 8 (or more...) sprockets and fix your ship!

If you like, post your time and sprocket counts here on itch.io! I'd love to see them! 😄

Credits

- Public domain PBR textures used are from ambientcg and polyhaven.

- The caustics texture was retrieved from opengameart.

- Many sounds are derived from public domain clips on freesound.

Everything else is my work.

Source Code

https://github.com/HoneyPony/gwj41
